title: Cadillac, Michigan
summary: Cadillac /ˈkædɪlæk/ is a city in the U.S. state of Michigan. The city is the county seat of Wexford County.[6][7] The population was 10,355 at the 2010 census. Today US 131, M-55 and M-115 have a junction at this city. The geographic center of Michigan is approximately five miles (8.0 km) north-northwest of Cadillac.[8]
